name: ssvid
description: Unique Id combining source_tenant and source_ssvid

name: source_tenant
description: The proprietary of the data (Eg: country)

name: timestamp
description: This is the unix timestamp for the time the message was received by the original receiver.  You should use this as the effective timestamp for the message

name: source_ssvid
description: Source-Specific Vessel ID. this is the record id provided by the source (aka: internal_id, IR -NAF-, etc...) or a unique identifier generated by us

name: external_id
description: Vessel registration detail; the side number of the vessel (aka: External Registration Number, XR -NAF-)

name: registry_number
description: Number used to register the vessel in the authoritative entity. (aka: Matricula, codMarinha, Plate, Registry Number, etc)

name: callsign
description: Radio call sign of the MMSI-registered vessel

name: flag
description: The flag of the vessel in ISO 3166 Alpha-3 code [https://www.iban.com/country-codes]

name: length
description: The length of the boat in meters

name: width
description: The width of the boat in meters

name: updated_at
description: The exact moment this record was updated by us (GFW) this is when the vessel info record is stored in our BQ tables
